name: OVERFLOU
description:
Водица затапливает город!  Нужно забраться как можно выше, пока еще не слишком поздно! 

--------------------

The water is covering the city step by step. You need to find the way right to the top before the flood covers you and the city.

WASD - Moving

Space - Jump

Alt - Kick/Use (there are interactive levers)

To restart the game after defeat, you need to close the game app and open again.

PC_BUILD_draft is a draft.
OVERFLOU_0.02 build is playable.
OVERFLOU_0.03 build has some design updates.
OVERFLOU_0.04 build has some fixes.

Authors:

du5ka (niksolncev@gmail.com) - Code & Game Design
